text: Deelaa go di hagababa ne hai gi godou maadua mmaadua i mua i dogu lahamai digaula i Egypt, tenua dela e hai gadoo be di ulaula o di ahi ang gi digaula. Au gu helekai gi digaula bolo gi hagalongo mai gi di Au gi haga gila ina aga agu helekai huogodoo. Au gu helekai gi digaula bolo maa digaula ga haga gila aga, gei digaula gaa hai nia daangada ni aagu, gei Au gaa hai di God ni digaula.
